DOC.brief_summary: Intravenous Carbetocin is more efficient than intravenous infusion oxytocin in management of placental delivery in 2nd trimester interruption.
DOC.brief_title: Randomized Clinical Trial for Comparison Of Intravenous Carbeitocin Versus Oxytocin In Management Of Placental Delivery In Second Trimester Interruption
DOC.criteria: Age:1650 years Pregnancy duration: 1424weeks Spontaneous abortion or medical induced abortion at 1424weeks Age less than 16years and more than 50 years Surgical termination Placenta previa Uterine fibroid
DOC.keyword: CARBETOCIN AND OXYTOCIN AND SECOND TRIMESTER INTERRUPTION
